title: [FR] Filter input should hide all connections excluding those match input
author: filimonic
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Filter input should hide all connections excluding those match `*input*`

## Expected Behavior
Like `TERMINALS`:
Having servers connections named 
`FS-LONDON-01, FS-WARSAW-01, <25 other FS-* for other cities>, DC-LONDON, DC-WARSAW, <25 other DC-*>`
When typing to filter field "LONDON",  I want to see only 2 items in a list: DC-LONDON and FS-LONDON.

## Current Behavior
Currently there is no filtering. I can not find ...

iterations.description: This is a feature request to enhance the connection filtering behavior by hiding non-matching entries in the connection tree.
